channel.title: Help me spend some cash :P
channel.description:
Hi..
Well i have an account with 10m cash on, low level noob that havnt played in a year or so. I've never actually gotten a skill over level 85 befor.
So my question is, does anyone know a skill/items i can spend this on, that might reach a skill to 85+ and not take too long?
I was thinking buying yews and burning them for firemaking exp? but i d'ont know :P

item.title: Help me spend some cash :P
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

goatee:

Burning logs is tedious and boring and not many people would do such a stupid thing. The cape emote is shit tbh.

The emote may be shit but the cape(t) is probz best looking, closely tied with fishing (t)

Read full topic

item.title: Help me spend some cash :P
item.dc:creator: @skiller_noob1 skiller noob1
item.description:
@skiller_noob1 wrote:

You could raise your mage high alching spend money on 4k alches and get an air staff spend the rest on Yew Longs (u) and you’ll be raising your mage in no time.

item.title: Help me spend some cash :P
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

I have a ranger with 61 ranged, wonder how much 10m could get me too, except im sure its so much time so i probably wont bother with that, but if i had to choose a 99 skill it would be ranged.

I’m not p2p so i cant try out fletching, might go p2p soon though and do some fletching, as i belive you make money back with the high alching etc. ?

Read full topic

item.title: Help me spend some cash :P
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“xEnt, post:1, topic:221205”]Hi…

Well i have an account with 10m cash on, low level noob that havnt played in a year or so. I’ve never actually gotten a skill over level 85 befor.

So my question is, does anyone know a skill/items i can spend this on, that might reach a skill to 85+ and not take too long?

I was thinking buying yews and burning them for firemaking exp? but i d’ont know :P[/quote]
First off: Maples/Willows are the best for burning as they yield most xp vs cost. Yews are a big waste.

Second: Firemaking/Cooking/Fletching are all really easy skills

I’d say go with fletching to 85 as I’ve gotten that numerous times over the years and at least with 85 fletching you can actually just about do everything with that skill.

Read full topic
